Wisdom: الصَّبْرُ عَلَى طَاعَةِ اللَّهِ أَهْوَنُ مِنَ الصَّبْرِ عَلَى عُقُوبَتِهِ
enWisdom: Patience in the obedience to Allah is easier than patience in the face of His chastisement

Wisdom: اصْبِرْ عَلَى عَمَلٍ لَا بُدَّ لَكَ مِنْ ثَوَابِهِ وَعَنْ عَمَلٍ لَا صَبْرَ لَكَ عَلَى عِقَابِهِ
enWisdom: Be patient with the action which will surely bring you reward and refrain from the action the punishment for which you will not be able to bear

Wisdom: اسْتَتِمُّوا [استمتعوا] نِعَمَ اللَّهِ عَلَيْكُمْ بِالصَّبْرِ عَلَى طَاعَتِهِ وَالْمُحَافَظَةِ عَلَى مَا اسْتَحْفَظَكُمْ مِنْ كِتَابِهِ
enWisdom: Seek the perfection of Allah’s blessing upon you through patience in obedience to Him and preserving that which He has commanded you to preserve [and act upon] of His book

Wisdom: مَنْ صَبَرَ عَلَى طَاعَةِ اللَّهِ وَعَنْ مَعَاصِيهِ فَهُوَ الْمُجَاهِدُ الصَّبُورُ
enWisdom: Whoever is patient in the obedience of Allah and refrains from His disobedience, then he is [indeed] a patient struggler

Wisdom: صَابِرُوا أَنْفُسَكُمْ عَلَى فِعْلِ الطَّاعَاتِ وَصُونُوهَا عَنْ دَنَسِ السَّيِّئَاتِ تَجِدُوا حَلَاوَةَ الْإِيمَانِ
enWisdom: Bid yourselves to patiently perform acts of worship and protect yourselves from the impurity of evil deeds, [as a result] you will find the sweetness of faith
